segments.text: Good afternoon , ABC Incorporated . How many I direct your call ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to speak to Mr . Miles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry , sir . He isn't in right now . Would you like to leave a message ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Can you tell him Bob White called ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there a telephone number where you can be reached ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can be reached at 544-879-9087 until 5 p . m . today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , sir . I'll tell him you called .
segments.speaker: S1
